alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Inland; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:25PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Mobile and northwestern Baldwin Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1225 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Stockton, or 10 miles northeast of Creola, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Creola, Chunchula, Stockton, Axis, Mount Vernon, I65 And AL 225 and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
